request: Initialize a new Astro project and set up the basic project structure as defined in the PRP (`.rox/tasks/ROX_PLAN_LINKINBIO/context.md`).
Install and configure Tailwind CSS for the Astro project, following the official integration guide.
Install and configure TinaCMS for the Astro project.
Create the initial commit with the project setup and push it to a new GitHub repository.
